Title: Tommy
Writer: The Who (by), Ken Russell (screenplay), Pete Townshend (rock opera), John Entwistle (additional material), Keith Moon (additional material)
Actors: Oliver Reed, Ann-Margret, Roger Daltrey, Elton John
Plot: A psychosomatically deaf, dumb and blind boy becomes a master pinball player and, subsequently, the figurehead of a cult.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.
